com.googlecode.lanterna.gui

Interface Container

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractContainer, Panel

    public interface Container
extends Component
    This interface must be implemented by any component this is to have subcomponents.
    Author:
    Martin

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Component

    • Method Detail

      • addContainerListener

        void addContainerListener(ContainerListener cl)

      • removeContainerListener

        void removeContainerListener(ContainerListener cl)

      • addComponent

        void addComponent(Component component,
                LayoutParameter... layoutParameters)
        Adds a new subcomponent to this container.
        Parameters:
        component - Component to add to this container
        layoutParameters - Optional parameters to give hits to the layout manager

      • removeComponent

        boolean removeComponent(Component component)
        Removes a component from this container.
        Parameters:
        component - Component to remove from this container
        Returns:
        true if a component was found and removed, false otherwise

      • getComponentCount

        int getComponentCount()
        Returns:
        How many component this container currently has

      • getComponentAt

        Component getComponentAt(int index)
        Parameters:
        index - Index to look up a component at
        Returns:
        Component at the specified index

      • containsComponent

        boolean containsComponent(Component component)
        This method can used to see if a particular component is contained with this objects list of immediate children. It will not search through sub-containers, you'll need to do that manually if you need this functionality.
        Parameters:
        component - Component to search for
        Returns:
        true is the component is found in this containers list of direct children, otherwise false
